research.title: Research
research.subtitle: Manage your research progress, priorities, and tracked categories for your dashboard.
research.signInRequired: Please sign in to manage your research.
research.categoryOverview.title: Research Category Overview
research.categoryOverview.description: Each category shows your overall completion. Click a tile to view and edit that category. Categories with a dot are included in the dashboard research progress tile.
research.category.noEntries: No research entries for this category yet.
research.category.clickToView: Click a category tile above to view research tasks.
research.filter.search.label: Search
research.table.name: Name
